EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-02-21 O'Reilly Dual eBook eBlast - US and EMEA.ES-2019-02-21 O'Reilly Du
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Guide from O'Reilly - Intro to IaaS Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Are you trying to build a working IaaS solution in either AWS or Azure? Don't tackle that project alone. Our eBooks will take you through practical examples, design patterns, and tips to help you confidently build a working IaaS solution.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRcHAAU]]>Intro to AWS Iaas Solutions <[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRcHAAU]]> Master AWS core components and how to design for resiliency. Learn how to launch and manage your cloud solution using either the AWS command-line interface or the AWS web console.
Intro to Microsoft Azure IaaS <[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRcMAAU]]> Learn how to manage your Azure IaaS solution, including virtual machines and storage, using both the Azure CLI and the Azure Portal interface.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRcHAAU]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRcMAAU]]>
Wherever you are in your cloud journey, Turbonomic can help you optimize your IaaS strategy today!
